name: Blood Haul
description:
Blood Haul is a game where you and a friend fight through hell's fortress, seeking the enchanted blood of immortality along the way. You better be prepared! This explosive and over-the-top action will send you through an adventure of chaos and gore.

Key features:

  • Bloodthirsty combat
  • Intense boss battles
  • Cooperative play
  • Highscores

Game developed by Screenshake Productions, 2017.
